advice.noise_fix_before_gain: Fix the background hum first - increasing gain now can make noise worse.
affiliate.disclosure_short: Links may be affiliate links; it does not change your price.
audio.playback.memory_notice: Playing from your browser memory (not uploaded).
audio.playback.subtitle: Hear exactly what was analyzed to build trust in your results.
audio.playback.title: Playback
audio.playback.waveform_unavailable: Waveform preview is unavailable in this browser.
audio.waveform.caption: Peaks are marked in red. Aim for a strong signal without clipping.
audio.waveform.title: Input waveform
level.note_noise_first: Noise is the primary issue. Fix it before adjusting gain.
no_speech.description: Please speak closer to the microphone or check if your mic is muted.
no_speech.title: No clear speech detected
overall.summary.fair: Good fundamentals; one issue is holding this back.
overall.summary.noticeable: Background noise is significantly impacting clarity.
overall.summary.severe: Background noise is significantly impacting clarity.
overall.summary.strong: Good fundamentals; one issue is holding this back.
recommendation.reduce_echo: Add soft furnishings or close doors to reduce echo reflections.
results.excellent.body: This setup should work well for meetings, streaming, and recording. No changes needed.
results.excellent.share_hint: Want to save it? Share your result.
results.excellent.title: You are good to go
results.next_steps.title: Best Next Step
results.notice.low_certainty: Results may be less reliable. Try again in a quieter environment.
results.notice.no_speech: No speech was detected. Speak clearly and try the test again.
results.sample.playback_locked: Record a sample to unlock playback on this page.
results.sample.subtitle: This is a preview of the insights you will receive after recording.
results.sample.title: Sample Results
test.details.grant_access: Grant mic access to view details.
test.details.title: Recording details
test.header.subtitle: We will capture 5-7 seconds to analyze level, noise, and echo.
test.header.title: Record a quick sample
test.ios.note: iOS note: iOS browsers can apply system audio processing. For best results, speak close to the microphone in a quiet room.
test.results.placeholder: Your results will appear here after recording.
usecase.warn.echo: Should work for meetings, but echo may reduce clarity in larger rooms.
usecase.warn.generic: It should still work, but one issue may affect clarity.
usecase.warn.level: Should work, but you may sound quiet unless you speak closer to the mic.
usecase.warn.noise: Should work, but background noise may reduce clarity.
